name: Kozyrev Horrors
storyline: In 1990, Russian scientists conducted experiments with Kozyrev Mirrors to enhance extra-sensory perception. Participants, referred to as Psiconauts, reported disturbing experiences, including sightings of mysterious entities known as "The Observers." Take on the role of Irina, a scientist seeking answers after her friend Viktor disappeared during a journey into the mirrors, resulting in a coma.
summary: Step into the Kozyrev Mirror to unlock your Extra Sensory Perception. Beware: dread and horror await. Investigate to find an escape from this liminal space. Are you truly alone? A short and chilling singleplayer horror game, inspired by the Kozyrev Mirror experiments.
